findings.title: Incorrect and Unused interface present in the smart contract
findings.description: The NftMkt.sol file contains an IERC2981 interface which is currently unused and doesn't define the royaltyInfo() function correctly.

findings.title: Contract bytecode exceeds the 24KB bytecode size limit
findings.description: The ERC721Marketplace smart contract's size exceeds 24576 bytes due to which the contract may not be deployable on the Ethereum mainnet without enabling the optimizer.

findings.title: Anyone can call the updatePayTo() function
findings.description: The updatePayTo() function in ERC721Marketplace smart contract does not check the validity of the caller, hence anyone can call this function and update the payTo mapping for any tokenId.
